item.title: The Gen Z revolution in Asia shows the power of the young - and their limits
item.description: Anti-corruption demonstrations, powered by social media, have toppled a government - but will they lead to lasting change?

item.title: Kyiv can win all of Ukraine back from Russia, Trump says
item.description: He says Ukraine can win back land with support from Nato and Europe, marking a major shift in his position.

item.title: Macron calls Trump after motorcade blocks his car
item.description: Macron and Trump were in New York for the 80th UN General Assembly

item.title: Six years ago Trump's UN audience laughed, this year they were silent
item.description: The US leader's address was one of the clearest expositions of the way he sees the world, writes James Landale.

item.title: TV stations refuse to air 'insensitive' Kimmel's show after ABC lifts suspension
item.description: The comedian's late-night show was suspended last week after his remarks about the killing of conservative influencer Charlie Kirk.
